title: Banned Issue
body: Hey, i have recently been banned on my account @A Decent Kennen. I just wanted to say sorry i was having a bad day my cat got hit by a car and i was just really ticked off today, i just wanted to say that im not only sorry to you, im sorry to the community, im only asking for another chance, i spent a lot of money on this game. Im not asking to completely unban me, im just asking for a reduced 2-3 weeks ban, i understand if you dont want to give me this 3rd chance and you get the final say, but i did spend over 100$ and many hours dedicated to this game playing with friends and family. So please if you could, give me one last chance, i promise you wont regret it. -A Decent Kennen

replies.body: We're more than happy to take a look at your account to see what happened to have your account hit with a perma-ban. It does look like several warnings were sent letting you know that what you were saying was inappropriate, but you're still welcome to reach out to us one on one in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to open up that discussion again.
Thank You For your time and hopefully you get to read this :D
